title: Comments
text: When you auto play an ad (which is already ugh) please stop bringing me to the top of the comments page. If I wanted to watch the video by itself I would watch it on my tv. I mostly use my phone to read the comments. It‚Äôs difficult to do that when I have to keep scrolling down to find where I was in the comments before the ad pulled me all the way to the top. I don‚Äôt mind ads especially because I‚Äôm not paying $13 a month for anything else but your app should still function correctly with ads. I‚Äôm NEVER going to visit the ad website so please stop pulling up the ad info and making me lose my spot in the comments. Thanks

title: Why?? Why change the user interface?
text:
Okay. I like the app, there‚Äôs no doubt about it, but why would you move the comments section? I don‚Äôt get it. It‚Äôs so uncomfortable to tap, and sometimes I accidentally unsubscribe from YouTubers I like as a mistake for trying to get to the comments. Also being able to show ads in better quality than the video? Why does that happen? If you can‚Äôt show a video, then don‚Äôt show me the ad. 3 stars because the app is good, but the comments changing, AND the home tab being based on my preferences is bad. I know I would like that content but you give other creators no chance. Just show a random video to me, and maybe I‚Äôll be interested enough to watch that and subscribe to that person. 

Thank you very much.     

P.S. please put the comments back.

title: This bug needs a fix!!!
text: Every time I try to organise my search to sort by upload date (obviously to see new videos that have to do with what I‚Äôm searching from NEWEST to OLDEST) but instead of showing it in the correct order (new videos uploaded to older videos uploaded- ex: 12 hours ago, 1 day ago, 2 days ago etc) it shows two videos from a couple of hours ago and then a video from 7 MONTHS AGO and then after the 7 month one it shows one from 5 months ago and after that one from 4 months ago???? What tf is wrong with the sort by upload date tab in search filters ??? Please fix this, I find that I can‚Äôt even use the search to find what I want because it won‚Äôt work at all

title: The 100M+ views you deleted üò°
text: I would give you 4 stars because you have way to many ads and it annoys the crap out of me and I don‚Äôt have the money for premium, but you deserve one star. If they had a 0 star option I would definitely pick that in a heartbeat. What you did with the BTS ‚ÄúON‚Äù MV was total bs. People stayed up all night and tried their best to get to 100M, but you decided to delete all there effort. This isn‚Äôt the first time you decided to pull this kind of crap, and I‚Äôm getting sick and tired of it because you don‚Äôt know what we have to go through to reach that goal. You saying that you don‚Äôt delete our work but just freezing it, is the biggest lie I have ever heard. Basically all you‚Äôre doing by saying that is just clowning yourself it‚Äôs annoying and retarded. How about next time when BTS drops another MV YOU LEAVE US TF ALONE. I hope your app drops to a 1 star rating because that‚Äôs what you deserve.

title: App is fine. Could use some improvements.
text:
With the current update, the ability to swipe minimized videos off the screen was removed, and now only the X button will close it. I used the feature very frequently and it was much more convenient than the current process. 

I feel it would be beneficial to have more input on the videos we are recommended. A feature in which we can choose whether or not content is interesting to us could impact the videos we are recommended, and help us to find content we want to find. I am often suggested content that I do not want, yet it gets repeated over and over without a way to remove it. This feature could also include approval of the content and suggest that we want more of the same content.

title: Two few problems at least.
text:
This is a good app, I would give it at least 5 Stars since I use it a lot whenever I'm bored. But however, the new updates kind of made no sense. I don't know how making Miniplayer off for videos made for kids even helps honestly or what's the point of it even. The videos out there not for kids still have the Miniplayer not available either which is odd since the video is NOT for kids.

Another odd thing is forcing your liked videos to become private. I don't see the point in that either or how it protects us or anything, if we wanted our likes videos private we could just go onto settings and make it private. Not force it to become private, I didn't understand why that came along with the new update. Unless there's another way to make your liked videos unprivate.

title: What‚Äôs up with the lack of navigation?
text:
What I don‚Äôt get about this app is that there is no easy way to navigate forward and backward to videos you have just watched. So I cannot easily - and that is the keyword - branch to a new video and then return to where I was two videos ago. I have to go to History and find that video. Only that is in itself difficult. 

And never mind the endless crashes where my history just is not saved. How is it that a app that has been around as long as this one has, cannot return to vertical mode without crashing? My method of watching videos is watch two or three and then terminate the app and restart because it got stuck in useless horizontal mode again.

title: Freezie Bug
text:
I use this app almost daily, so I notice things change often. I don't mind a few tweaks here and there, but there's one bug that's been especially annoying. Now, when scrolling through videos, they will automatically show a preview before you click on one. This in itself isn't a problem. However, if I'm already watching a video in the background and another one shows a preview, the video I was just watching goes black and cuts off all sound. Rewinding doesn't help; I have to exit the video I was watching and click on it again to resume where I left off.

EDIT: The problem was fixed for a while; now the app isn't working at all. I reset my phone with no results.

title: Amazing

title: May 2020 update
text: Latest update not only hides comments behind a wall where you can‚Äôt read them unless you tap a text link that‚Äôs about 4 pixels high, it also broke the actual function of the comments section, with glitches like the comments automatically starting you back at the top and other glitches leaving the user scrolling infinitely in a futile attempt to get to the bottom. I noticed no improvements in experience in any other areas to make up for this, either. Incredible how YT can go from a an already excellent, working system, to this mess. I really expect better in this day and age than this regression in UI from Google and TY.

title: Frustrating at every turn and barely functional.
text:
Use desktop browser instead.  Forgo mobile app.

App now fails to load long playlists, regardless of what kind of connection I have.  3G, LTE, Wi-Fi, you name it.  If I want to scroll to the bottom of my 600-video music playlist to move one to a different spot in the running order, FORGET ABOUT IT!  This is only the latest issue in a long list of beefs I have with the app.

I keep getting recommendations in languages I don‚Äôt understand, with no method of language selection.  The algorithm is all messed up, videos on auto-generated ‚ÄúTopic‚Äù channels I like are impossible to find within the app and difficult to find with a standard browser.  The ‚Äústill watching?‚Äù prompts pop up way too often, ads are abundant and frequently inappropriate with no way to report them, and the recommendations list on each video is far too short.

title: Your app update was a lie
text: Every bug I had encountered before is still there.. Stop making crappy changes and make changes that really matter.. Maybe it‚Äôs easier to get to the comments section now, but that wasn‚Äôt even an issue.. But trying to arrange videos in playlists and having the video disappear and the playlist auto scroll in one direction, unable to stop the scroll, and having to force close the app and reopen just to be able to even click on a video is a problem that‚Äôs been persistent for the last two updates.. That‚Äôs the kind of changes that need to happen.. You guys are being ridiculous.

title: Shame on this network
text: Why is it that the freedom of speech (let alone America‚Äôs Constitutional right) is being scrubbed off on all video clips that  pertain to factual news? We, as Americans, want the freedom to make our own educational opinion and choice as to how our government is operating our Country.   It saddens my friends, family members, neighbors and communities to watch not only the reporters bogus news, now your station has agreed to scrub All video‚Äôs of the truth.  Wow..we people, around the world, want the ability to finish watching All Videos to the end without being blocked by a lady with a white hat and it‚Äôs annoying music which prevents us from freedom of speech.  Shame on this network.

title: Hidden: A True Crime Podcast
text: I have listened to many true crime podcasts‚Ä¶ but after finding Hidden:A True Crime Podcast‚Ä¶  I have found my home!  I love this podcast!  I love John‚Äôs professional opinions and I love Lauren‚Äôs approach to things.  When you listen to podcasts about true crime, sometimes it gets heavy and dark.  Sometimes I have to mix it up with something lighter.  But John & Lauren really dig deep and it is so interesting to me.  I know the subject matter can be dark and disturbing‚Ä¶ but they way they approach it, and explain it and really get to the meat of it, helps me process it and have an understanding of it. I love their style, I loved that they are married and she calls him Babe.  It‚Äôs my very favorite podcast!

title: Queue display keeps disappearing
text:
There appear to be two "modes" and I can't tell how to switch between them but keep getting into the wrong one.

I'm talking specifically about when using iPad to manage the queue for Roku. In one mode (the good one) the queue is collapsed at the bottom of the iPad screen and can be expanded to see what's in it.

In the other mode (the one I keep getting stuck in and can't figure out how to get out of until it changes on its own) shows a sort of "picture in picture" with a freeze frame of the video that's playing on the linked Roku. In this mode, the queue is missing. It's still possible to add videos to the queue but the queue is not visible on the iPad.

Trying to get rid of the "picture in picture" (which is of course useless since the video is playing on Roku, not on iPad) results in Roku aborting to the main screen with a message that the iPad cleared the queue.

There is something seriously wrong with the UI that the queue management screen is mysteriously changing with no obvious button menu or other UI component to control it.

title: Crashes and doesn‚Äôt work anymore
text: I‚Äôve had the app for years and now it just won‚Äôt work. I have an IPhone 14 Pro Max and an iPad Pro both with the latest software. When I click on the app it immediately closes and crashes on my iPhone and iPad. I have uninstalled the app, restarted both devices, cleared network settings, turned my data on and off and nothing. I kept them deleted for about 9 hours and redownloaded the app on both devices and it still does the same thing. I had to request a refund for my premium cause I‚Äôm not gonna pay if the app doesn‚Äôt work. Hopefully there‚Äôs an update or something but idk I‚Äôm pretty disappointed.

title: Too many changes

title: No Volume Bar
text: With the most recent update, the volume bar has gone away. It used to be that when I was watching videos horizontally (full screen) that to not intrude on the visuals, the volume square that usually shows up in the middle of the screen when adjusting the volume doesn‚Äôt appear. Instead there was a slim white line toward the top of the screen that would show me the volume that I had the video at. However, recently this white volume bar indicator has gone away and now there is no way to tell what volume the video is at which our sliding up and looking in my control panel to adjust the volume. Adjusting volume still works but I liked it when I was able to see what the volume was at while adjusting. Overall, everything else is g√ºd.

title: Nothing to do
text: With nothing to do but watch you tube while I sweat all the shows are fun. But I would rather pay to watch than watch so many ads. Sometimes the ads are informative but though I would like to buy the product, I wonder if they are legitimate. They say that they are tested by agencies I have never heard of. I don‚Äôt like watching ads that really aren‚Äôt giving something of value compared to what they promise. Thirty to a hundred dollars is a lot of money if one buys similar products from many different companies and none of them are what they advertised. I would rather pay three times the price and at least get the ingredients advertised.

title: Please do something about the amount of ads
text: A lot of times when I am watching a video there is one of those 15 second long ads that I can‚Äôt skip which is really annoying, especially when the ad is longer than the video. I like to watch many cat videos which are usually less than a minute, sometimes even 5 seconds. This is a part of the app that really brought down my rating and my interest in it. I personally think that if the person posting the video unable to make any money from the ads in their videos(8 mins) besides demonetization there shouldn‚Äôt be any. My other complaints are any animation style video having the comments tuned off and dislikes removed. Besides this the app is pretty good. Also please deal with the Elsa gate situation.

title: Not happy

Do the right thing and get in contact with those effected and come to a resolution whatever it maybe.

title: Unreliable
text: I‚Äôve been using this app for years, and it seems like new bugs crop up all the time with no new features to balance them out. With the most recent update, my feed freezes every minute for a few seconds, and this can even happen when I get an ad, which makes an otherwise skippable ad take twice as long to skip. For some reason there is nowhere to report bugs, so I can‚Äôt even try to get the issues I‚Äôm having fixed. The app does have times of good innovation like swiping up on a video to full screen it, but improvements often feel like 1 step forward and 2 straps back. My biggest grievance with the app is the lack of Picture in Picture which would make up for all the bugs I experience, but with no support in the past several months, I doubt it will ever come or it will be monetized :/

title: App is amazing just one simple problem
text: So it used to be the best with only 1 ad at each ad break so i saw most of it and at the time was 5 stars. Then they added it so that there would be 2 ads sometimes in each ad break, but the first one would be 5 secs and the other would be skippable or it would also be 5 secs which would still be 5 stars. But then they made it so that both of the 2 ads could be 15 SECS which means they are unskippable so that means it‚Äôs basically a 30 second ad in 1 which those are skippable so they just made it‚Äôs so it‚Äôs 30 seconds and unskippable which is very annoying. That‚Äôs where it went to 4 stars. But overall still an amazing app. I definitely would recommend it if you have nothing to really do a lot.

title: So so

title: Glitch and ads
text: This is a five star app don‚Äôt get me wrong but when I‚Äôm editing my playlist and I‚Äôll drag something to the bottom or to a new place it just pops me back up. Also when ill be dragging down the song will just disappear and if I let go it will still be scrolling down it gets me very frustrated because I have to go back up to get the song again and try to redo it. Another thing I dislike are the ads I don‚Äôt mind having them because they don‚Äôt run long but for the longest time now all I get are 3 minute to even an hour long ad I hate it because although I can skip sometimes I let ads play through because I know they‚Äôre short but now I cannot even leave my phone alone for 3 minutes without having to skip an ad

title: Downloads section needs work
text:
I will definitely change my rating to a 5 star if they address the download section. I watch most videos offline so I spend a good amount of time downloading videos to watch later. Deleting previously watched videos takes too many clicks when trying to delete even 5-10 videos. Let alone if there are 30 or delete. You have to select each video individually and go to delete. Why can‚Äôt it be like every other iPhone based app with an edit button that lets you select a bunch at one time then click delete. 

The other thing is that they play in the order that they were downloaded with most recent first. We should be able to reorganize the list so we can make them play in any order we want without having to get out of the video and back in the list to pick a video. Just my two cents.

title: What happened?
text:
I‚Äôm not sure if it was an update but, On my laptop when I try to edit my channel art it says that in order to select an item from my storage I need to sign in, but when I try to sign in it says the feature I requested is currently unavailable and that I need to try again later. I‚Äôve tried three days to get this to work but every time the same thing happens.
I‚Äôve looked into it a lot and even asked for help, but it just won‚Äôt work.
Also, I hate the idea that you can no longer change your profile picture and channel art on a mobile device. The only reason I don‚Äôt like this is because I do almost everything with my iPad or iPhone.
Other than that the app isn‚Äôt all that bad, but it could use some work.

title: It was good till recently
text:
There‚Äôs been several bugs we‚Äôve been experiencing and I know cause I‚Äôve came across this several times, but whenever I try to open the description for a video it will morph itself inside the list of other videos or comments. The next one is that almost 7 out of 10 times I watch a video where it starts off with an add, either the audio will be extremely off or the video will just stop at one frame yet the audio will still play yet it doesn‚Äôt get fixed unless you watch the same video from a different device, and thirdly there‚Äôs been problems with the dark theme where either the screen will spaz out with white and black colors, and one time it will just turn into a dark void of nothingness.

title: I really enjoy your website, very informative and educational.
text:
I have found the answer on your great website from things like how to get stains out of a white shirt collar, to repairing my car, to grow certain plants for vegetables, and just about anything else there‚Äôs an answer on your website. title: Good but the update kinda messed up my viewing experience
text: I love the app and have been using it ever since I got my iPhone 7 plus and I've had no issues. Until now. After doing the update yesterday, for some reason it's making it very harder for me to watch a video. Say for instance I just started a music video, it will play for about 10-30 seconds, before it magically turns to the next video on my upcoming. This has been happening with every video and live steam I've been trying to watch. It's actually getting very inconvenient for my viewing. I would then have to open and reopen the video at least 3 times before I cab watch the entire thing. With adds in between. I still really enjoy the app, but I hope this will be fixed soon.

title: New update horrible
text: As for the new update, it made it worst. Every time I try to move forward a video, the loading screen gets stuck on the screen and it keeps it like that for the rest of the video until u close the app and reopen it again. Plus it takes longer to load anything on the app even having wifi connected to the phone. And sometimes whenever u try to skip the video taping 2 on the screen the app freezes and u cant do anything unless you reopen the app again, and this only happened on the mew update. In my opinion this new update was a really bad idea. never had this problem before in any update, I have a iPhone 14 pro max , so the type of phone is not the problem. really need to fix this bugs.

title: Background Play

title: Double-Tap Ads????
text: There was a lot of talk on the more then one ad to me I get it there‚Äôs a chance that person left the videos going and plays through. But when someone is actually paying attention to the video they can just skip the ads all at once not even looking at the second ad. Now They‚Äôre deciding to do these ‚ÄòDouble-Tap‚Äô Ads which is frankly really annoying. Needing to wait 5 seconds to skip one ad only to watch another is not my main reason to skip the first. I know that companies exploit the ads by making them 5 seconds not being able to skip the ads is possible but just leave it like that. If any case I‚Äôll end up with 2 ads running for 10 seconds and be done with it. Now I need to do double taps on them. Honestly if you‚Äôre going to play ads make them short because the main thing I want to watch is the video I clicked on not the ads.

title: Views, likes, and subs keep disappearing
text: Please fix this issue now my my mom was liking the vid on her acc and it won‚Äôt show her like, when I came back to my vid like an hour later it used to have 9 likes and now it has 3 I tried liking my vid on my other accounts but it would show the like ether it just stayed at 3. Also a few mins before the like issue I used to have 43 subs a few mins later I have 39 and then I got 42 several mins later and in a couple mins I have 39 subs.  A few mins later after the sub issue I had 174 views in total after a couple mins it turns to 120, several mins later it goes back to 174. Please fix this issue.

title: Done with the home tab
text: Can‚Äôt disable muted autoplay or videos while scrolling? Guess I‚Äôll stop scrolling altogether. Glad I was able to snap out of it after all these years. My recommendation? Hop into your ‚Äúlibrary‚Äù section and get to work on all that content you‚Äôve been waiting to check out, either in your watch history or ‚Äúwatch later‚Äù playlists. Finish what you‚Äôve started, consume content INTENTIONALLY. Autoplaying videos as you scroll is not some benefit, or fancy feature, or innovation meant to serve you. It‚Äôs an abuse of your senses. It‚Äôs predation upon your most fundamental mechanisms for processing information. How little these higher-ups seems to respect your time and attention. They‚Äôve got all the tricks and then some- all the data in the world- and won‚Äôt hesitate to use it all to squeeze whatever they can out of you. Keep that in mind as this app AND YOUR ENGAGEMENT WITH IT continues to change.

title: RATE: ZERO
text: It‚Äôs too bad zero is not an option. You currently have millions of consumers requesting for an explanation as to why millions of views were deleted and no response! People worked hard to stream videos of artists we love and support. And yes the artist we all are talking about is BTS!!! The millions of views deleted is disheartening! We are human beings using your platform to support them and BTS choose to use your platform to show us their crafts. But each and every time we‚Äôre treated like we don‚Äôt matter! The ONLY reason why I even go on your channel is because of BTS!!! I cannot wait until they launch or partner with another company to have their own streaming app. KARMA WILL COME FOR YOU!!!!

title: Many problems but it‚Äôs functional
text: This app has lots of problems even if they‚Äôre just features and not a bug. The first thing is that your app will completely restart if you didn‚Äôt close it before opening an app because you are going back to it but it completely restarts if you leave it running in the background for like 2 minutes or so. The second problem is that little box in the corner saying the video has a paid promotion. First off, it‚Äôs useless. Every video has a paid promotion everywhere with big youtubers and you add a little box saying so. However, that little box seems like it take a whole minute to disappear and then when you open up the video timeline it shows up again. It‚Äôs freaking useless! There‚Äôs more problems but this review is already stupidly long. I sound like a boomer when I type this whole review.

title: Terrible
text: I don‚Äôt know who in their right mind thought putting the comments right under the description was a good idea. It‚Äôs dumb and should‚Äôve been left at the bottom also making the videos under the one you‚Äôre watching, bigger wasn‚Äôt great either it‚Äôs just ok. But every time you exist or turn your phone off for a minute once you go back on it‚Äôs refreshes and the video you were watching is gone. It‚Äôs always crashing and closing the app which doesn‚Äôt make sense since it was fine before all the mobile update bull. Not to mention every time a certain group get over a million views the views get taken down which is bad because on music shows they count those views and when they‚Äôre deleted it mess it‚Äôs the contenders and wins. What‚Äôs going on this is dumb

title: please change the comments back!
text: it‚Äôs great, i use it a lot, esp now that we have nothing else to do. i spend 2-3 hours total a day on here on a normal day and probably upwards of 4-5 now that we have to stay home. i can watch a lot of different content, from memes, stan twitter to random educational videos. i use it to look up answers for math questions i have issues with. it‚Äôs very useful and very entertaining and has content for every interest. i was even considering resubscribing to premium but the issue that made me unsubscribe is back! why did you move the comments? the position they‚Äôre in right now is confusing. just put them back where they were. i received this update a few months ago and complained a bit but they returned back to normal soon after. i didn‚Äôt think much of it but was very thankful. however, today i went on and instead of scrolling, i was redirected to the new place where the comments are. it‚Äôs very uncomfortable. please put them back, or at least make an option where we can choose to have them in the original place vs the new place. i strongly dislike the new placing and would appreciate a way to return them back to normal. i would normally rate it 5 stars but the experience right now is very bad compared to when the comments were in their original place. thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Please stop deleting all those views
text: As a viewer I understand there is an issue with loops and bots but as a BTS ARMY I have to take notice on how you deleted 67M views from their latest MV ‚ÄòON‚Äô. The fan base is highly dedicated to breaking records for the group and if you didn‚Äôt know, BTS have a well thought of storyline that is fans love to decipher and figure out which makes us rewatch the video. We noticed how we broke the record for 10M in 65 minutes but then we got 25M in 5 hours? ARMY‚Äôs we‚Äôre trying to give that video views and break the records WITHOUT looping and streaming it by watching videos in between. We understand the rules and we tried to follow them but taking this many views from the video is too far. It happened during BwL and it‚Äôs even worse now. BTS don‚Äôt need bots to get views as their highly dedicated fan base will give them what they deserve as the biggest boy group on the planet. Please stop and bring the views back that BTS deserve, that many creators deserve.

title: Best information available
text: This is my new television. I can spend countless hours watching everything you can think of. Just type it in and search away. People deliver news and share videos to keep you informed. Nerd out on conspiracies or science breakthroughs, watch funny viral videos, learn health, exercises, or watch cooking recipes. See compilations of your fav shows funniest moments , top ten videos, or watch stand up comics. See travel destinations, or your favorite channels latest video uploads. This modern world we live in is so fascinating because we have access to so much information anything you can think to ask you can see and learn, right at your fingertips! A video is worth a thousand words.
